name: The Seeker
description:
The Seeker is a classic retro RPG featuring a party of characters following an exciting quest.

STORY:


Join four orphans as fate calls upon them for a role greater than they could have ever imagined!
Prove yourself worthy of becoming a Seeker and defeat the Unholy Beast hellbent on ruling over those you care for!

FEATURES:


  • Classic Storyline
  • Dynamic Party System
  • Fun & Witty Dialogues
  • Secret Rooms to discover
